issue.title: Update Multisense ladar and camera values to match hardware

content.raw:
I missed Steven's comment.  Thank you for pointing me to the commits.  I was concerned that #386 might go on for a long time and the easy fixes would be lost.  In looking at the commis should be points be 1080 or 1081?

I have not tried rates other than the default.  My assumption was that rates above 10Hz would not work for matching.  (A better wording would have been the default rate is 10Hz at the default resolution).

Where is the TODO list?
content.html:
I missed Steven's comment. Thank you for pointing me to the commits. I was concerned that #386 might go on for a long time and the easy fixes would be lost. In looking at the commis should be points be 1080 or 1081?

I have not tried rates other than the default. My assumption was that rates above 10Hz would not work for matching. (A better wording would have been the default rate is 10Hz at the default resolution).

Where is the TODO list?
